about_the_game:
Jey's Empire

Step into the shoes of J. Edgar Hoover, the legendary director of the FBI, in this captivating historical strategy RPG game.

Embark on a thrilling journey as you combat various organizations such as the Mafia, Communists, the Ku Klux Klan, the Black Panthers, the Weather Underground, and many others.

You'll have the opportunity to uncover and control the major events of the 1960s, from the mysterious assassinations of Marilyn Monroe to John F. Kennedy.

As the master of secrets, you'll operate from the shadows, pulling the strings of American politics.

Immerse yourself in a unique blend of strategy and RPG gameplay.

Manage your empire like a seasoned tycoon, making critical decisions that will shape the course of your operations.
Engage in RPG-style interactions with a diverse cast of henchmen, gangsters, and iconic personalities from the vibrant 1960s.

But beware, your enemies are determined to oust you. Cultivate your invaluable collection of secret files to always stay one step ahead.

Take charge of Jey's Empire and become the enigmatic puppet master of an era defined by power, intrigue, and strategic prowess.

Are you ready to make history?

Step into the shoes of J. Edgar Hoover, the legendary director of the FBI, in this captivating historical strategy RPG game.

Embark on a thrilling journey as you combat various organizations such as the Mafia, Communists, the Ku Klux Klan, the Black Panthers, the Weather Underground, and many others.

You'll have the opportunity to uncover and control the major events of the 1960s, from the mysterious assassinations of Marilyn Monroe to John F. Kennedy.

As the master of secrets, you'll operate from the shadows, pulling the strings of American politics.

Immerse yourself in a unique blend of strategy and RPG gameplay.

Manage your empire like a seasoned tycoon, making critical decisions that will shape the course of your operations.
Engage in RPG-style interactions with a diverse cast of henchmen, gangsters, and iconic personalities from the vibrant 1960s.

But beware, your enemies are determined to oust you. Cultivate your invaluable collection of secret files to always stay one step ahead.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS Sierra or higher
  • Processor: i3 or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1300 MB available space

name: Jey's Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM

short_description: Step into the shoes of J. Edgar Hoover and combat the Mafia, Communists, the Ku Klux Klan, the Black Panthers, the Weather Underground, and more as you shape history with your every move. Download now and become the ultimate mastermind in this thrilling management RPG!
